Hackathons.title: **OXFORD**HACK 2018
Hackathons.description: Over the course of 24 hours, I led a team to build an app which transcribed live and archival data from the House of Commons for a mobile viewer.

Hackathons.title: Hack**MIT** 2019
Hackathons.description: Of a choice of 6 ideas I drew up, we built a app for the 'Social Goodness' category that sought to quantify an individual's contribution to others and the environment.

Personal Projects.title: **LAZY**bot
Personal Projects.description: A discord bot perfected for chess servers

Personal Projects.title: aloysiuslip.com
Personal Projects.description: My personal website, an opportunity to experiment with front-end technologies

Personal Projects.title: **LAZY**mail
Personal Projects.description: Intuitive mod-mail features for Discord inspired by new Reddit mod-mail

Open Source Projects.title: **lichess** for JS
Open Source Projects.description: The predominant JavaScript wrapper for the lichess API

Open Source Projects.title: **ECF** for JS
Open Source Projects.description: The Node.JS API for the ECF chess grading database to make gradings human-readable and queryable

Open Source Projects.title: aho-corasick
Open Source Projects.description: Extremely fast, extremely powerful, ES6 implementation of the Aho-Corasick string-matching algorithm with high user-customisability

Open Source Projects.title: select-prop
Open Source Projects.description: A powerful and light-weight selector for instantly cutting to the heart of big, nested data to find all useful properties. Takes a simple string query parameter and fetches all possible matching nested values of an object.

Open Source Projects.title: get-param-names
Open Source Projects.description: A unique library that takes a JavaScript function and returns its input parameter 'names'. Tested to work with even destructured params and params with default values

Open Source Projects.title: midi-encoder
Open Source Projects.description: Simple CLI to convert musical notes into their ASCII values, for cryptanalysis purposes

Open Source Projects.title: csv-json
Open Source Projects.description: User-focused CSV parser to JavaScript object using JSON 3 syntax
